price: [Isaanis] “Lakkisaa; abbootii keenya akkas kan dalagan agarre” jedhan.
arabic: قَالُواْ بَلۡ وَجَدۡنَآ ءَابَآءَنَا كَذَٰلِكَ يَفۡعَلُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: qālū bal wajadnā ābāanā kadhālika yafʿalūna
